definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly

sentences.english: The UNSC fleet MAC rounds impacted on the Covenant destroyer.
sentences.chinese: UNSC舰队的MAC炮弹冲击着圣约人的驱逐舰。

sentences.english: The United States Navy destroyer Barry fired Tomahawk missiles from the Mediterranean Sea on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 周六，美国海军驱逐舰巴里从地中海发射战斧导弹。

sentences.english: The destroyer sliced through the water.
Shenzhen, the Chinese People’s Liberation Army’s naval destroyer, entered Tokyo Bay.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军的深圳号驱逐舰进入了东京港。

sentences.english: Most of these destroyer commanders are qualified naval pilots.
sentences.chinese: 这些驱逐舰指挥官大多数是合格的海军飞行员。

sentences.english: Wuhan, is the multi-purpose missile destroyer too.
sentences.chinese: “武汉”号，是一艘有多用途的导弹的驱逐舰。

sentences.english: China's Type 055 destroyer as good as US Zumwalt-class destroyer?
sentences.chinese: 中国055型驱逐舰堪比美科幻战舰？

sentences.english: Beijing had made firmly clear its objections to the planned sale of the destroyers.
sentences.chinese: 中国已明确表明反对美国向台出售驱逐舰的计划。

sentences.english: Some old destroyers in the fleet are ready to be pensioned off.
sentences.chinese: 舰队里有几艘旧驱逐舰就要退出现役了。

sentences.english: Satellite communications are key to the operation of the AWDs.
sentences.chinese: 卫星通信是防空驱逐舰运行的关键系统。

sentences.english: Junkers were ordered northwards to help a German merchantman which were under attack by a Norwegian destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 容受命飞助正遭受挪威驱逐舰袭击德运输船。

sentences.english: The U.S. Navy has sent a guided missile destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 美国海军出动了一艘制导导弹驱逐舰。

sentences.english: The security and warmth of the  destroyer's sick bay were wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 驱逐舰的病室很安全也很温暖，好极了。

sentences.english: The Japs claimed a cruiser and a destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 日军声称击沉了1艘巡洋舰和1艘驱逐舰。

sentences.english: Another destroyer will visit the port of Chinhae.
sentences.chinese: 另外还有一艘驱逐舰将到镇海港访问。

definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
